Usually I’m too lazy to leave a review but this jumper was fantastic. Good quality and fits great. The length was perfect too however I’m on the shorter side at 5’3 so if you’re taller they might be a little more ankle length. I’m 5’3, 135 pounds and I got a small for reference.

I lived in this while pregnant. It held decent but the straps did unravel some soon after I started wearing. It’s comfy, but can be dressed up. I even bought one for my pregnant SIL. I’m 5’3” and the length wasn’t too long. I did think the color was more vibrant (blue) than pictured.  Would buy again.

I’m just about 5’1, 125 lbs, ordered size Medium and the length of it is perfect. It’s the first time I won’t have to get the pants hemmed which is great. However, the material I wish was more of a cotton feel, but it’s light and airy enough to serve it’s purpose. It does have a shiny look to it up close, but because it’s bright red, it’s not as noticeable. I suggest using fabric softener on cold water when you wash and air dry to avoid any type of shrinkage. Although its not what I experienced so I’m satisfied with that.
These are very comfortable and cozy.  I wear them mostly around the house but have worn them out, as well.

Have one that was a 4x that I love but as I'm no longer a 4x I decided to buy one in my size. I wish I had ordered one size up so it would be a little longer and flowy. I still love it but not as much. It's super soft, has pockets, looks great with a shirt, body suit or nothing. Very versatile. I worn it alone, paired it with a belt and blazer, sleeveless turtle neck i haven't found anything yet that makes it look bad.

Absolutely LOVE these jumpsuits especially for the price. The material is so nice and they wash very well. I have had the black sine June and still wear it. 评论概述: I lived in this thing the entire summer! It's SO comfy!!
评论详情: My husband hates these overalls! He calls them my mu-mu pants! LOL! It's really cute, I really like it and I get a ton of compliments when I wear it! But the best things about it is how comfortable it is! I'm even wearing it around the house with long sleeves under it now that it's gotten colder! I don't really wear it out much, especially now that it's colder and it really only looks good with flip flops or sandals. I had to cut the legs down and hem them when I got it (I'm only 5' tall and these were pretty long). I got a little carried away so they're more like long capri's but they're perfect on me in the summer! The crotch is a tad long but that's to be expected when you're only 5' tall so the adjustable straps come in handy. I can't wait to get this in another color next year! I don't care if these go out of style and if you get one, you won't either. The comfort and versatility of these outweigh any of that!
This is just ok - good if you want a coverup. Not great if you’re on the shorter side.

I bought these back in September but unfortunately our weather has been too hot to wear pants. I put them on today 10/19 for the first time and wore them for 3 hours and as I was standing loading the dishwasher one of my straps broke off. So now I can’t even wear them. They were cute and comfy but getting 3 hours wear is not worth it, I’m bummed the quality is so poor.

评论概述: Not yellow, but I still love it!
评论详情: I knew from other reviews that this was actually a peach color instead of yellow, but it's still a pretty color so I don't mind. Also, I should have gotten a large. I'm 5'2 and 150 lbs and although it does fit very loose for my style I prefer the extra loose look for these style jumpers. Plus most of my weight is in my tummy, 🙄 and the butt area is not as draping as I would prefer. Still tho with all of that I'm going to still keep the medium because it's still adorable! So really the fit just depends on your preference. I also got it in black and I will keep that one too. If I order again in a different color I will get the large. The adjustable straps are great for us shorties so I can wear it barely hitting the floor to wear with sneakers or adjust it to have it at my ankle when wearing sandles. The fabric is very soft and flowy.
This garment should advertise only for tall thin figures. I’m 5,7 160 lbs and the large looks frumpy and the medium fits weird.
Cheap t-shirt material, run big and poor quality. Complete waste of money
Love it, fits comfy and love the color
Too short for me. Actually returned
Looked like PJ’s on me.  Not something I would wear out.

Super cute, super comfy little jumpsuit great for a chill day at home or running errands! I tried other prints/solids and this was by far the most flattering IMO. I was sad that the pants aren't longer (I'm 5/8"), but I tied knots at the hemline and it has a cute harem look that looks great with a denim jacket!
I wear it because it's cute, but it's scratchy
I wore some jewelry and dressed it up looked great I sized up one. Love the xl better than the L short  one’s I bought

I included a picture of the bottom of the leg details.  So cute.  Isn’t purple at all.  Navy background with hot pink and blue flowers.  I’m 5ft4 178 on a good day.  I carry all my weight in my belly and have no boobs to speak of.  I bought a Medium and it is perfect.  The pockets are in the right spot and the straps are adjustable.  There is a cute pleating around the v neck that accentuates the chest area.  I washed it in the sink because I was too excited to wait for my washer to get fixed.  It’s a super soft fabric.  We’ll see how it fares when I get a hot flash… lol.  I just bought another one.

评论概述: Comfy, cute, kinda looks like pajamas
评论详情: The top kinda looks like pajamas, but other than that it is very comfortable and cute. The fabric is soft and it washes well
I would live in these if I could. They are so lightweight and roomy!

I bought a couple of these long full jumpers, and sized up! Amazing and comfortable. I bought more colors. I'm 5'3 near 174lbs postpartum 15 months with second kiddo. I was able to get into my 130s after 2yrs postpartum, and the jumper I had before although L was awesome, I went up an extra size and the only dislike is the length drags a bit vs a large... my weight fluctuates a lot with postpartum and until I get my sleep back I'll be here for a while LOVING these rompers. You can add tight fitting shirts long sleeves for winter months or wear a bra in summer. Fabric is light and even though I got a sage green instead of army green, it's not terrible but I'd give it 5 stars for getting the color right. It's not terrible but it's not worth sending back. I have an Army green short romper and showed in comparison... ordered more, so hopefully the colors match their names. 🥰I'm please with the feel, the baggy and straps are not flooding, and prefect for fall and layering🫡  Yes has pockets, adjustable straps and ruffled neckline to add some feminine flare🙂

The jumpsuit is very soft and stretchy but not clingy, which is awesome. I ordered an XL, it fits well. The length is great, I’m 5’0 and the legs of the pants just hit the ground. It did come with the right strap not sewn to the back, like they just forgot to sew it together, and the fabric is on the thin side. The pockets also stick out a little weird, but overall, I really like this piece!
The material was over poor quality and the print was not nearly as cute in person.  The fit was off on me as well.
So comfortable. And versatile. Can be worn for 3 out of 4 seasons in NY. Not sure the light material would be comfy warm for cold days. Great fit!

评论概述: Cute, comfy, true-to-size, color not as described.
评论详情: Purchased the “purple floral,” disappointed that there is literally no purple on it—it is navy & magenta with lighter blue & peach. Love this jumpsuit, only issue is the crotch comes down to mid thigh!  So if you have larger thighs, you will not like this. Maybe I just have a really short torso. The straps are adjustable so I was able to tighten them all the way, it helped a little by bringing the crotch a bit higher & I was ok when I wore it but only went out to dinner. If I was doing alot of walking, I know it would have bothered me
